content: Just landed in NYC. Japan changed my view on things, now to weave it into my monthly reflection piece.
raw_content: Just touched down in NYC, feeling a mix of excitement and uncertainty. Japan has reshaped my perspectives, now it's time to integrate these lessons into my monthly reflection piece. #NYC #Reflection

content: Turning 22 and starting a gratitude journal to keep track of my growth and connections. Here's to documenting the journey!
raw_content: Reflecting on turning 22, I've realized how much I've grown. Starting a gratitude journal to document this journey and keep those connections strong!
